In England, in the seven days to 10 July, there were 197,192 new confirmed cases (350.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 July, there were 149,197 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 32% (47,995 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 July is 4,594,159 (8,162 cases per 100,000 population).
